meta.name: DMV
meta.description: DMV is set at the place everyone dreads going most: theÂ DMV. Our quirky and lovable characters are making minimum wage, doing a thankless job where customers are annoyed before they even walk in the door. Good thing they have each other.

videos.title: The Next Window
videos.overview: At the Big Sac holiday party, Colette tries to impress Noa before his single window closes; Barb's effort to save the East Hollywood DMV backfires when she accidentally tackles the director, but assistant Sally steps in to help.

videos.title: Pilot
videos.overview: Colette pines for her coworker Noa while enduring teasing from colleagues Gregg, Vic and Ceci; new manager Barb rallies the crew to save their branch from government shutdown.

videos.title: Stay in Your Lane
videos.overview: When the insanity at the DMV causes a new hire to quit, Colette worries Noa will follow and tries to make things better; employees and customers struggle through a sweltering day with a barely functional air conditioner.

videos.title: Easy Pass
videos.overview: Colette is tasked with giving Noa his driving test; Ceci helps Barb get camera-ready for her new manager portrait.

videos.title: Don't Kill the Job
videos.overview: When Colette runs into an old friend at the DMV, she pretends to be a fellow customer rather than an employee in order to save face.

videos.title: Stick Shift
videos.overview: When Ceci accuses Colette of only being kind for the credit, Colette anonymously gives Noa the perfect gift.

videos.title: Blindspot
videos.overview: Colette is crushed to learn that Noa is dating someone; Barb tries to find out who is defacing DMV property with childishly inappropriate drawings.

videos.title: There Is No I in DMV
videos.overview: Barb takes the team on a field trip to the rival North Hollywood branch to learn the secrets of their success; Barb begins to doubt herself after meeting their charismatic manager, Beau.

videos.title: Splash Fountain
videos.overview: Colette's effort to redirect holiday plans takes an unexpected turn when it lands her trapped in a car; a surprising new friendship stirs up jealousy among the team.
